style.css:
/* i really want this to be global */
.ac-pushButton {
background-color: rgb(17, 94, 163);
  color: white; /* White text */
  border: 2px solid #0078D4; /* Blue border, same as the background for a solid look */
  border-radius: 5px; /* Rounded corners, adjust as necessary */
  padding: 10px 20px; /* Top and bottom padding, Left and right padding */
  font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px; /* Font size, adjust as necessary */
  font-weight: bold; /* Makes the text bold */
  text-align: center; /* Center the text inside the button */
  cursor: pointer; /* Changes cursor to a hand symbol when hovered */
  text-decoration: none; /* Removes underline from text */
  display: inline-block; /* Allows setting padding and width/height */
  margin: 4px 2px; /* Space around the button, adjust as necessary */
  -webkit-transition: background-color 0.3s; /* Smooth background color transition */
  transition: background-color 0.3s; /* Smooth background color transition for non-webkit browsers */
}
